overview: Suave businessman Kristof Cale has a way of tempting ladies back to bed, and even mature hottie Caroline Ardolino isn't immune to his charms. Meeting at work conference in Prague, the brunette MILF ended up back in Kristof's swanky hotel room for a sizzling hot night. After the best sex of her life, Caroline decided it was time to get back to the real world.
title: Mature Tendencies
